profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
Welcome!

Baz Aluminum has a proven record of excellence in designing and managing several building and construction projects in the GTA. No matter the size of your project, the experienced professionals at Baz Aluminum will plan, design, construct, and maintain your project.
You'll Be Glad You Chose Us
Effective planning is crucial to the successful completion of any project. Before starting the project, our team of experts will first assess your goals. Then we provide you with an estimate and time-line for completion. From beginning to end you will be involved every step of the way.
Cost-Effective Services
Eliminate all the items on your to-do list by calling the experts at Baz Aluminum. You'll be glad you did. We have many years of experience and work hard to make sure the job is done right while saving you time, money, and aggravation. We'll be there whenever you need us.
Call us today to get your project underway

profile:
Topflight Aluminum is dedicated to providing quality construction and exceptional customer service. We strive to build lifelong relationships with our customers and to exceed your expectations, in every aspect of the job, from start to finish.
We’ve helped thousands of people improve the look and quality of their homes and businesses. We are proud to serve Toronto (GTA), Etobicoke, North York, Scarborough, Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Markham, Stouffville, King City, Aurora, York Region, Mississauga, Oakville, Hamilton residents with expert craftsmanship and professionalism. We pride ourselves on being able to exceed the expectations of our customers.

•	WHY TopFlight Aluminum?

1.	Quality first, Speed second
We all like our issues to be resolved efficiently when contacting a company, but what will make you use Topflight Aluminum again and again? There is only one answer. The quality of the service!

2.	Great Customer Service
We understand that building or remodeling a home is a major investment, so for us it is important that our customers feel valued. Topflight Aluminum pays special attention to what our clients want, we remember the details no matter how insignificant and deliver quality services at all times.

3.	Top Quality Materials
Apart from good workmanship and top-grade professionals handling your building project, the best quality of materials we use will be next most important factor in determining the outcome of your building.

4.	Warranty

Building your dream house shouldn’t be a nightmare! That’s why we only use guaranteed products and materials with 30- to 50-year warranties. Additionally, all of our work comes with workmanship warranty. Whether you are replacing or repairing, Topflight Aluminum can always meet your needs!

OUR MISSION
Our goal is simple… To perform for our customers the highest level of quality construction services at fair and market competitive prices. We aim to maintain the highest levels of professionalism, integrity, honesty and fairness in our relationships with our suppliers, subcontractors, professional associates and customers.





GET A FREE QUOTE
No unexpected charges —see exactly what your home needs with a free estimate.

profile:
GTA Siding Inc. is a family owned and operated business that has been helping our community meet their siding and roofing needs since 2010. Our owner and CEO, Frank, has 20+ years of experience in the siding industry and has a stellar track record when to comes to completing jobs in an impressive short timeline. With so many unreliable contractors out there, it is important you have a contractor with a permanently established place of business to be more stable and available when you need them.

****

If the company doesn’t have an established track record, how do you know they will be around to repair any warranty concerns you may have with the work performed? GTA Siding has been an established business in the construction field since 2010. We take personal pride in every project and customer satisfaction is our #1 goal.

Honest, dependable and reliable, you can TRUST the experienced professionals at Elite Roofing. Providing you with superior customer service is a priority at Elite Roofing. We want you to know that we take your project seriously and we work hard to build a lasting and trusting relationship with our costumers.

Our Experienced team of Roofers and support staff specialize in: New Roofing, Roof Repair, Siding, Gutter Installation and repair.

Our excellent reputation and long list of satisfied clients attest to our superior craftsmanship, attention to detail, clear communication, honesty and integrity.
